author: igv4321
body:
Executables and instructions for making and writing HBHENegativeEFilter (a.k.a. HCAL negative energy filter) objects into the CMS database.

Detailed description and instructions can be found in the file CondTools/Hcal/test/readme_HBHENegativeEFilter.txt.

This PR will not modify any existing results.
title: Tools for creating and writing HBHENegativeEFilter objects to CMS db
